title: Seven years in a row: Deutsche Bank scoops top Cash Management accolades from clients in Euromoney survey
body:
For the seventh consecutive year, Deutsche Bank has been voted No.1 cash management provider in Western Europe and No.1 in Germany. In total Deutsche Bank won seven No.1, four No. 2 and two No.3 positions and ranked amongst the top 7 in five more categories.
“Defending our leading position in Europe and our home market Germany for seven consecutive years is a truly outstanding achievement. In a highly competitive, rapidly changing payments landscape, our clients clearly appreciate our expertise and ability to deliver value. This is something we can be very proud of – and indeed, we are!”, said Michael Spiegel, Deutsche Bank’s Global Head of Cash Management.
The benchmark survey, conducted by international trade publication Euromoney, asked clients around the world to indicate their top providers of cash management. The findings are based on validated votes from over 25,000 corporates and 2,000 financial institutions. According to Euromoney, this is the most comprehensive guide to the cash management arena in the market.
